name: Round Round
description:
I decided to make a game for couple of different jams that are happening right now! Hard to choose one, then why not choose them all!

Extra Credits Game Jam #3 - theme Cycles -  https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-jam-3

8 Bits to Infinity - theme Darkness - https://itch.io/jam/platformer-week

Weekly Game Jam Week 86 - theme Platform to Heaven - https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-86

In this game you are climbing the tree. There are only 4 levels (like full year cycle, 4 seasons). Can you finish them all?

Use up, left, right arrows or WAD to move and jump.

Press R to restart the level.
